function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proactive case finding and retesting for COVID 19","Impact":"Identifying new cases and preventing further spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Enhance testing capacity, improve surveillance systems, and educate healthcare workers","Technologies":"Rapid COVID-19 testing kits, contact tracing apps, and data analytics tools","People":"Patients with severe respiratory symptoms, citizens with suspicious symptoms, individuals under quarantine","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health departments"},{"Description":"Overloading of the hotline system","Impact":"Inability to effectively report and track suspicious symptoms or cases","Mitigation":"Establish additional hotlines in each major city, implement technology to automate hotline management","Technologies":"Call center management software, AI-powered hotline systems","People":"Citizens reporting suspicious symptoms or cases","Owner":"Local government authorities, technology service providers"},{"Description":"Disease stigma and compassion for affected individuals","Impact":"Neglect of affected individuals, reluctance to report symptoms, and misinformation","Mitigation":"Provide support services, education campaigns, and mental health resources","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, online support groups, social media monitoring tools","People":"Individuals under quarantine, affected individuals, general public","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, mental health organizations"}]}
